markdown.markdown: A visual record of presentations, posters, and recognitions. --- **American Association for Respiratory Care Annual Congress** Phoenix, AZ | November 2025 ### Young Investigator Award ![Receiving the Young Investigator Award at AARC Congress 2025](young_invs_award_2025.jpg){width="50%" fig-align="center"} ### Poster ![Preferences of Senior Respiratory Care Students and Early-Career RTs When Selecting an Employer: A National Survey](AARC_congress_2025.jpg){width="60%" fig-align="center"} - **Poster title**: Preferences of Senior Respiratory Care Students and Early-Career RTs When Selecting an Employer: A National Survey - **Role**: First Author & Presenter --- ## AARC Congress 2024 **American Association for Respiratory Care Annual Congress** Orlando, FL | November 2024 ### Editor's Choice Presentation ![Impact of Ventilator Settings, Nebulizer Placement, Bias Flow, Humidification, and Circuit Adaptor on Aerosol Delivery During Invasive Ventilation — Selected as Editor's Choice](AARC_congress_Presentation_as_editor_choice_2024.jpg){width="50%" fig-align="center"} - **Presentation title**: Impact of Ventilator Settings, Nebulizer Placement, Bias Flow, Humidification, and Circuit Adaptor on Aerosol Delivery During Invasive Ventilation - **Role**: First Author & Presenter - **Recognition**: Editor's Choice --- ## AARC Congress 2023 **American Association for Respiratory Care Annual Congress** Nashville, TN | November 2023 ### Posters ::: {layout-ncol=2} ![Survey of Ventilator Waveform Interpretation Among ICU Professionals](congress_2023_6.jpg) ![A Physiological Study to Assess the Effects of Awake Prone Positioning in Healthy Volunteers Under Different Respiratory Support](AARC_2023_5.jpg) ![Aerosol Delivery to Simulated Spontaneously Breathing Tracheostomized Adult with and without Unheated Humidification](AARC_congress_2023_4.jpg) ![Continuous Albuterol Delivery Using Heliox for Pediatric Patients](AARC_congress_2023_3.jpg) ![Aerosol Delivery to Simulated Spontaneously Breathing Tracheostomized Adult with Heated Humidification](AARC_congress_2023_2.jpg) ![Aerosol Delivery to Simulated Spontaneously Breathing Tracheostomized Pediatrics with Heated and Unheated Humidification](AARC_congress_2023_1.jpg) ::: - **Role**: Co-Author & Presenter across multiple posters - **Posters presented**: - Survey of Ventilator Waveform Interpretation Among ICU Professionals - Physiological Effects of Awake Prone Positioning Under Different Respiratory Support - Aerosol Delivery in Tracheostomized Adults — With and Without Humidification - Continuous Albuterol Delivery Using Heliox for Pediatric Patients - Aerosol Delivery in Tracheostomized Adults with Heated Humidification - Aerosol Delivery in Tracheostomized Pediatrics with Heated and Unheated Humidification --- ## Academic Awards ### Outstanding Academic Achievement & Outstanding Research Award ![Outstanding Academic Achievement and Outstanding Research Award, Rush University 2023](rush_university.png){width="60%" fig-align="center"} - **Institution**: Rush University, Chicago, IL - **Year**: 2023 ---
